alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 10:52PM MDT until June 11 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jones County in central South Dakota... Southwestern Stanley County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 1245 AM CDT/1145 PM MDT/. * At 1151 PM CDT/1051 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midland, or 20 miles northeast of Kadoka, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Okaton around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Murdo, Draper and Westover. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
